TopicTitle: Free copy of Making History Challenge

Articles.Content:
Well this didn't get much traction on Reddit which surprised me. But I'm offering a free copy of Making History Expansion in Reddit KSP.  So if you can't afford it, or don't wanna pay money this is you chance.  

Kerbal Space Program Reddit Challenge.

 

Deadline is this Friday.

Edited March 14, 2018 by malkuth
Can we post entries here, or must it be in the reddit thread?
